name: Conscious Grasp
description:
The goal of the game is to find your home. Find the white light, surrounded by bushes.

You can move with the W, A, S and D keys. Look around with the Mouse.

If you have any problems with the browser version, try downloading the version that is compatible with your OS. The Windows build has been tested, but Mac and Linux have not.

The inspiration for this game comes from my earliest memory. 

The first thing I remember is standing in the park that was outside my house, by myself. At this time I would have been aged 3. After looking around the park, I turned around to face my home. I don't know how I knew that the house I was looking at had my parents in it, since I remembered nothing before the park.  But, regardless, I knew that it was where I needed to be, so I crossed the park and a road by myself at a very young age.
